data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, subject source, source subject ID, and affection status of participants with primary breast cancer and involved in the "Study on longer adjuvant chemotherapy in Women with Early Breast Cancer" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: For the use in future research to learn about, prevent or treat cancer (APTC)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
